channel.title: RuneLegion - 498 - OSRS REMAKE
channel.description:
Hi, this is a brand new 498! It's oldschool-like!
[url=http://runelegion.info]Forums[/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/fvz91yxop9agnnn/Client.jar]Client[/url]
Pictures: [i][u]Tutorial Island Works:[/u][/i]
[b]Firemaking[/b] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/v85ef.gif[/img]
[b]Cooking[/b] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/v85ss.gif[/img] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/v8608.gif[/img]
[b]Mining[/b] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/v86av.gif[/img]
[b]Smithing[/b] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/v86ev.gif[/img]
[b]Warriors Guild[/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/warriors%20guild.png[/img]
[b]Full working Grand Exchange[/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/ezgif.com-video-to-gif.gif[/img]
[b]Quests![/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/quests.png[/img]
[b]Ardougne for starter money![/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/ardy.png[/img]
Fight Caves work! [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/Jad.png[/img]
[b]Pest Control[/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/pest%20control.png[/img] [b] Use ::to [location] ! (E.G. ::to varrock)[/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/to%20commands.png[/img]
[b]Dragon Slayer![/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/drag%20slayer.png[/img]
[b]Desert Treasure![/b] [IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q567/nevadahlo/desert%20reasure.png[/img]
More pictures/videos will be added later! Come try it out!
